responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "3158B7724962859B487AA4942CDF5390", "Not so swift, hero. It will take the Settler Militia to whittle down the bandits. They seem to be operating in more organized fashion. No doubt knowledge passed on by deserters. I don\'t know if I should kill them or join them.")
name: MADD_0005A_SMF_OrrikBlackwood_Phase03_7
